titleInfo.title: Letter from William Cowper, Commissary General, Bombay to Captain Henry Lindsay, Madras Horse Artillery, Persia

physicalDescription.extent: This letter is located in the middle of another item (IOR/R/15/1/17, pp 5-12).

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Captain that only five of the seventy-six horses he has sent to Bushire have been deemed fit enough for service with the 17th Light Dragoons. Contained in the letter is an offer to purchase some of the remaining horses for service within other regiments.
